definitions.definition: Requiring much endurance , strength , or patience .
examples: This bike is built to withstand even the most demanding terrain.

definitions.definition: Making great demands in terms of quality, quantity, accuracy or other criteria; difficult to satisfy.
examples: Our wines will satisfy even the most demanding of connoisseurs.

main_definition: Requiring much endurance , strength , or patience .
secondary_definitions: Making great demands in terms of quality, quantity, accuracy or other criteria; difficult to satisfy.
